actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a repayment of the Federal excise tax paid on gasoline and special fuels used in taxicabs.

summary.text: Provides a repayment of the Federal excise tax (presently 4 cents per gallon of gasoline) paid on gasoline and special fuels used in taxicabs pursuant to the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a repayment of the Federal excise tax paid on gasoline and special fuels used in taxicabs.
